Brooklyn Beckham is understood to have signed a prenuptial agreement with his heiress bride-to-be Nicola Peltz.
The £380 million fortune of 23-year-old Brooklyn's parents, David and Victoria, is dwa… [+3331 chars]

articles.author: Callum Wells
articles.title: Daniel Craig pulls out of Broadway's Macbeth with TWO HOURS notice after testing positive for Covid - Daily Mail
articles.description: The actor, 54, bowed out of the preview play with less than two hours until its commencement, through an announcement on Twitter, but is expected to return to the show once he recovers.
articles.content:
Daniel Craig was forced to temporarily pull out of his performance in the Broadway adaptation of Macbeth after testing positive for Covid on Saturday.
The actor, 54, bowed out of the preview play wi… [+2345 chars]
